flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Here I will show you how you can transform a remote control car into a device that can ignite your model rockets from over a hundred yards away. The idea came from my science fair project, when I wanted to be downrange and still push the button. It takes around an hour to an hour and a half to complete.
guide.introduction_rendered: Here I will show you how you can transform a remote control car into a device that can ignite your model rockets from over a hundred yards away. guide.summary: By isolating the circuit boards and lengthening the antennae, then isolating the controlled circuits, you can give the launch command from a hundred plus yards.
guide.title: Making an Remote Control Rocket Launch System
